author: eptwts
text:
i think the build in public space is one of the most ingenuine "fake" communities on the internet...

i do not like it at all

there's a few guys at the top who use this MLM-esque community to push indiehacker traffic to their products (built for indiehackers btw)

> make simple things seem hard
> build a community of 20-30yr old idiots
> document every little thing for social capital
> hope this "documenting" helps them sell their saas

the anon bh aff guys on money twitter are somehow more authentic, how ironic
